body.name: Septpent 4.5L Portable Mini Washer, Compact 24W 12V Home Blue Light Washer, Centrifugal Water Flow Dewatering,Auto Stop Single Tub Washer, for Apartment/Camping/RV/Underwear/Socks Baby Clothing
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins

features: 【ONE TOUCH START】 - This mini washing machine has a capacity of 4.5 liters, lightweight and convenient, can be placed in the car or other suitable places, one touch start, automatic shutdown at the right time, touch cleaning function lasts for ten minutes, won't take up space in your home.

【TURBO WHEEL】 - Mini washing machine spinning turbo cleaning method, turbo forward and reverse, deep will not hurt clothes. The new inner tube structure is designed to simulate the direct washing of clothes, such as tapping, rubbing and shaking. Dirt is cleaner during hand washing.

【DEWATERING FUNCTION】 - In the centrifugal washing mode of the mini washer, the inner tub rotates at high speed like dehydrating, driving the centrifugal water flow, effectively preventing clothes from deformation. There are drain holes at the bottom of the portable washing machine,which makes draining easier,faster and more convenient.

【BLUE LIGHT CLEANING】 - Portable underwear washing machine is operated by blue light, safer and more secure, built-in ozone breaks down cell membranes and reduces to oxygen when finished. Not only can you clean baby clothes, underwear, towels, socks, toys or other small items.

【AFTER-SALES SERVICE】 - Customer satisfaction is our top priority, we provide you 24 hours online customer service, if you have any dissatisfaction with our portable washing machine, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini washing machine for baby clothes, underwear or small items For the health of you and your family, wash personal items, delicates, baby items and pet items separately. This mini washer is a great choice for your convenience at home, in the dorm or while traveling. Easy to operate: Drainage holes in the bottom allow you to easily drain dirty water. The draining basket simply allows you to place your clothes, touch the wash function once for 10 minutes, and the washer has other functions. Please note! This mini washer is designed for delicate small items, not sweaters or bulky clothes The draining basket shakes off excess water to keep clothes moist and drip-free, and does not completely dry clothes

Efficient cleaning power The washing machine adopts blue light forward and reverse rotation turbine, which can deep wash clothes without hurting them. The inner tube structure is designed to simulate the hand washing process of tapping, kneading, twisting, shaking and stretching Perfect for washing underwear, socks, baby clothes and other light items, easily removes 99.99% of dirt. Compact size The lingerie washer is small enough to easily fit in a car or trunk above a large table washer. The washer is easy to carry around and protects your health and cleanliness all the way, so you can easily carry it with you and conveniently wash your clothes outdoors. Perfect for camping, vacations, business trips, apartments, dorms. Water filter design One button start, automatic stop when time is up, private underwear is not suitable for normal washing machine spin. With drainage holes at the bottom for easier and faster drainage, built-in drainage basket for fast drainage and easy solution to dripping water all the way through the dryer. With washing spin cycle and drainage basket function.

Ozone blue light double sterilization Certain things exist anywhere but are always ignored, they are really bad but widespread especially on your socks and underwear. They threaten your health, especially in newborn babies. So for your health and the health of others, don't wash your socks or underwear with your other clothes in a public laundry room. Now you just need a portable washing machine to protect your health by removing dirt effectively, no residue and no irritants, energy saving, water and electricity saving

Travel Washing Machine If you like to travel with your family, maybe you can put it together. It takes up absolutely no space in your RV and provides you with clean socks and towels while you're on the road.

Notes: 1.SAVES TIME: washing items takes only about 10 minutes. 2.EASY TO USE: Control the washer with just one touch of a button. 3.GREAT GIFT: It's perfect as an apartment gift for friends or family. 4.EASY TO CARRY: The portable washer is lightweight and convenient to take camping or traveling. 5.ADAPTER INCLUDED: The power plug includes an adapter that can be connected to 100-240V for use. No need to prepare an extra adapter for the washer when traveling. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Used it for underwear…was not impressed with result

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No instructions in English
reviews.reviewText: I got the general idea of this washing machine it’s not that complex, however, the instructions are in another language, and it’s not clear when to empty the washing machine and put in the spin cycle bucket.The buttons on the front of the machine are in another language as well so I don’t know what I’m supposed to be doing.I like the idea, however, I would not buy it again, unless they wanna give instructions on how to use the thing.Update on this reviewThis machine broke after the first use. It doesn’t do a thing now except sit on my bathroom counter and mock me.I have contacted the company and gotten no response so please don’t buy this thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Tiny, way smaller than what the pictures make it out to be.
reviews.reviewText: I was definitely underwhelmed by the size. Good for socks, underwear and a shirt at a time. I feel like this was bait and switch.
